title: Blood Finder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone at night to see if they have killed someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- People who kill someone will be covered in blood. It is assumed there is no water to clean off said blood.
- If someone tried to kill someone but failed for any reason, they will have plans detailing who they wanted to kill lying around.
- If someone has done an action that negatively impacted someone, they will write about it in their journal, and you will know how many times their visit has negatively impacted someone. You will not read the journal if the target is covered in blood or has plans to kill someone. )Some examples of negative impacts include: roleblocking, stealing feedback, lowering defense, etc.)
- You will know if someone is covered in blood, or who they planned to kill.
- Someone can have multiple plans if they fail multiple times.

desc:
Post 430
"Aha! These plans are all I need to convict this person!"
"Why don't you also read that journal right there?"
"Justice waits for no journal!"
